short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds yarn and pnpm commands next to the npm command; adds dev dependency switch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "More package managers in npmjs.com" extension, the perfect tool for developers using multiple module managers in their projects.

Our extension adds a set of buttons to the npmjs.com website that allows you to easily copy the command needed to add a module to your project dependencies for different module managers, including npm, yarn, and pnpm.

But that's not all - our extension also includes a switch that lets you choose whether to add the module as a development dependency or a regular dependency. This switch is pre-checked if the module includes only TypeScript types, making it even easier to add TypeScript types to your project.

With the our browser extension, you'll save time and effort by having all the necessary commands readily available to you on one platform. Download the extension today and streamline your module management process.
